tasks.task: Digging water absorption pits and contour trenches for water conservation.
subtasks: Using tools to dig 412-meter pits for water absorption.
Creating continuous contour trenches along the land slope.
Collecting excavated soil and placing it downslope.

tasks.task: Planting trees for oxygen production and environmental protection.
subtasks: Selecting tree species suitable for oxygen production.
Planting over 500 trees with community support.
Maintaining planted trees and ensuring their growth.

tasks.task: Managing wildfires through grass cutting and barrier creation.
subtasks: Gathering dry grass during hot seasons and droughts.
Cutting dry grass into small manageable patches.
Creating firebreaks to restrict wildfire spread.

tasks.task: Restoring neglected water resources like Baravs.
subtasks: Locating and identifying Baravs in the area.
Clearing vegetation and removing silt from Baravs.
Repairing structures of Baravs to restore water storage.
Surveying and assessing neglected stepwells and tanks.
Removing debris and silt from stepwells and tanks.
Undertaking repairs and maintenance of water structures.
